qas.question: Who takes care of the 132nd Street Community Garden?
The 132nd Street Community Garden is located between Malcom X Boulevard and what other Boulevard?
In which year did the garden receive a makover with a water distribution system?
Who funded the 132nd Street Community Garden's water distribution system?
How much did the 132nd Street Community Garden's water distribution system cost?

context: The 132nd Street Community Garden is located on 132nd Street between <a1_0>Adam Clayton Powell Jr.<a1_0/> Boulevard and Malcolm X Boulevard. In <a2_0>1997<a2_0/>, the lot received a garden makeover; the <a3_0>Borough President's office<a3_0/> funded the installation of a <a4_0>$100,000<a4_0/> water distribution system that keeps the wide variety of trees green. The garden also holds a goldfish pond and several benches. The spirit of the neighborhood lives in gardens like this one, planted and tended by <a0_0>local residents<a0_0/>.
